If you are having issues "pressing hard enough" with the QuNeo device, try the following:

Download the QuNeo Editor software, found here:  ___
Click on a pad (basic tab)
Raise Global sensitivity to maximum
Click on the advanced tab
Choose "dynamic" for the velocity table that all pads use

command-<left arrow> to move FWD to a new sensor
command-<right arrow> to move BWD to a new sensor

Repeat same basic process for each pad
